name: Rick Dangerous 3D
description:
Rick Dangerous 3D is a remake of the game Rick Dangerous by Core Design in 1989. It’s a student project release on January 2021 and developed in a month.

Pitch 

Rick is trapped in a mysterious pyramid. The corridors are full of treasures, but there are many deadly traps. Escape the pyramid without risking your life!
